original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil. Strong plants grew from those seeds. Each of these plants made 100 seeds.’
korean_text: 더러는 좋은 땅에 떨어지매 나서 백 배의 결실을 하였느니라 이 말씀을 하시고 외치시되 들을 귀 있는 자는 들을지어다

sentences.original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 씨앗들은 좋은 땅에 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: Strong plants grew from those seeds.
Each of these plants made 100 seeds.
